title: [Minecraft.net | INSIDER]十件你或许不知的事情：被动型与中立型生物
author: 封徵
txt_content:
Header10THings.png (224.65 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-16 09:38 上传





INSIDER

10 Things You Didn’t Know About Passive/Neutral Mobs
十件你或许不知的事情：被动型与中立型生物
Minecraft
Minecraft

Tom Stone 汤姆·斯通
Before we get started, I just want to let you know how close this video came to turning out very differently. If I had my way, this would’ve been a seven-hour romantic comedy starring a computer and an Enderman, and I would’ve been rightly proclaimed as a genius/fired.
在我们开始今天的视频之前，我得先告诉你这段视频差点就拥有了 完全不同  的命运。如果让我来做的话，这个视频就会变成一部长达七小时的讲述了电脑和末影人之间的浪漫爱情故事的喜剧，而我将会被世人称颂为 天才  (实际上我大概会被解雇)。

Anway, for our fifth video, in a series that I still can’t believe we were allowed to make more than one episode of,10 Things You Probably Didn’t Know About Minecraft reveals the shocking truth behind some of your favourite passive and neutral mobs!
不管怎么说，现在已经来到了我们这个系列的第五集了，不过讲真我到现在都不敢相信我们能被允许出了这么多集！《十件你在Minecraft里或许不知的事情》的第五集中我们将把视线投向游戏中那些可爱的被动型和中立型暴徒生物吧！

DISCOVER which mob is too cheap to pay for their share of the meal. GASP at the glorious glitch that made an adorable mob into a near-invincible beast. SCREAM at the terrible-looking fate of the poor precious pig, only to SIGH WITH RELIEF when the pig is totally fine, and nobody important gets hurt instead.
来看看到底是哪一个生物穷得连一顿饭都吃不起。为这些讨人喜欢的生物们因为一些小“失误”而变得“狂暴”起来而惊呼。因可爱的小猪们的悲惨命运而开始夺命狂奔，又为它们逐渐平静自己却无大的损伤而暗自窃喜。

Ready to board this emotional rollercoaster? Then CLICK on the video below!
准备好让你的情绪大起大落了吗？那就赶快点击下面的视频观看吧！
https://www.bilibili.com/video/av66466541来自狗粉丝字幕组

Want more great Minecraft videos?Click here to subscribe to our YouTube channel!
想要观看更多超棒的Minecraft视频?现在就来点击订阅我们的 YouTube 频道吧!

【封徵 译自官网 2019 年 08 月 30 日发布的 10 Things You Didn’t Know About Passive/Neutral Mobs；原作者 Tom Stone】
【本文排版借助了：SPX】
